title: Lost Balance [trip-hop]
description:
Although I intended to only post bootlegs and self-made mixes/compilations over here, I&#039;ve decided to throw in more than a small taster of my collection. Here are two albums from one of the best bands in trip-hop: Lost Balance. If you want more stuff from them or other trip-hop bands I&#039;ve featured on my compilations, just send me an e-mail at bochismyfriend[at]gmail.com
